actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to establish a reduced rate of postage for letters sealed against inspection mailed by private individuals.
short_title: Private Individuals' Postal Rate Relief Act

summary.text: Private Individuals' Postal Rate Relief Act - Limits the rate of postage for letters of private individuals within any class of mail maintained for transmission of letters sealed against inspection to 10 cents per ounce per letter. Imposes a civil penalty of $2,500 upon persons other than private individuals for mailing letters at the reduced rates established under this Act.

titles.title: Private Individuals' Postal Rate Relief Act
A bill to establish a reduced rate of postage for letters sealed against inspection mailed by private individuals.
